rows.label: tev012502_MSG0001
rows.name:
Aha! I believe I've spotted the rarest of all Miran
creaturesâ€”a BLADE with true grit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012502_MSG0002
rows.name:
What do you say, friend? Our team has long sought
out a [ST:gender p1=man  p2=woman  ]of rare character and spirit, but with
precious little success.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012502_MSG0003
rows.name:
However, in you, I believe we've finally found a
candidate worthy of Team Corwin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012502_MSG0004
rows.name:
Am I mistaken? Are you not worthy to explore at the
side of Corwin, New LA's most famous adventurer?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012502_MSG0005
rows.name:
Don't tell me you're not intrigued! And should that
intrigue become interest, please feel free to speak
with our captain directly.[ST:wait ]
